plotText.plainText: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

items.titleText: BoJack Horseman Christmas Special: Sabrina's Christmas Wish
items.plot: BoJack and Todd watch a very special Christmas episode of "Horsin' Around" to celebrate the holidays.

image.caption: Will Arnett and Alison Brie in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: Picking up where he left off, Bojack Horseman is now set to start filming his dream movie Secretariat.

image.caption: Lisa Kudrow and Will Arnett in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: BoJack is drawn to the one female in town who has no idea who he is (because she was in a coma). Todd opens a theme park.

image.caption: Will Arnett, Chris Cox, and Aaron Paul in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: A funeral turns into a treasure hunt for the "Horsin' Around" cast and a potential schmoozefest for Princess Carolyn and Mr. Peanutbutter. Meanwhile, Todd briefly reinvents himself.

image.caption: Amy Sedaris and Alison Brie in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: Mr. Peanutbutter throws Diane a surprise birthday party, putting tension on their relationship. Princess Carolyn and Vincent have a serious talk. Wanda tells BoJack a joke.

image.caption: Aaron Paul, Cedric Yarbrough, and Lisa Hanawalt in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: Todd tries to save a chicken from the slaughter house while Bojack and Kelsey are allowed some bonding time.
Princess Carolyn sees an opportunity when Mr. Peanutbutter's agent dies. BoJack flips when he says the "L" word out loud to Wanda.

image.caption: Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, and Alison Brie in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: Diane goes off script during BoJack's book tour, jeopardizing Mr. Peanutbutter's new show. Todd gets involved in international affairs.

image.caption: Alan Arkin and Aaron Paul in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: BoJack Horseman is a contestant on Mr. Peanutbutter's new game show, facing off against a mystery 'bigger celebrity' contestant.

image.caption: Will Arnett, Aaron Paul, and Brian Huskey in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: BoJack, Kelsey, Todd, Princess Carolyn, and Mr. Peanutbutter attempt to shoot a crucial scene in the Secretariat movie that was not in the script. Princess Carolyn and Diane contemplate their respective careers.

image.caption: Will Arnett and Alison Brie in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: Diane crashes at BoJack's place after quitting her job following Sebastian St. Clair, which puts a strain on BoJack and Wanda's relationship. Todd joins an improv comedy troupe which turns out to be a cult.
Bojack runs off to New Mexico to reconnect with an old friend, only to find she's happily married with a family. After staying longer than planned, Bojack makes another life mistake.

image.caption: Will Arnett and Amy Sedaris in BoJack Horseman (2014)

items.plot: BoJack discovers the Secretariat film was finished without him. Princess Carolyn starts her own agency firm. Todd finds himself trapped in the improv comedy cult.

arguments.displayTitle: The Best Movies and Series in August
arguments.description: Action, thrillers, romance, and more await in our top film and TV picks for August.

arguments.displayTitle: New and Upcoming Superhero Movies and Series
arguments.description: Here are the superhero movies and series that we're most excited to watch, including [i][link=/title/tt9362930/]Blue Beetle[/link][/i], "[link=/title/tt9140554/]Loki[/link]" Season 2, [i][link=/title/tt10676048/]The Marvels[/link][/i], and more.
